Class PercolationApp

java.lang.Object
  PercolationApp

public class PercolationApp
extends java.lang.Object

Percolation Program:
The PercolationApp class provides a main method for a version of the Percolation program with a graphical user interface.

Version:
8 February 2009

Alyce Brady

Start the Percolation program by creating its graphical user interface. The user will control all actions after that point.
